attributes.action: All British citizens should have the right to vote in the new referendum.
attributes.additional_details: Only UK residents voted in the Brexit referendum. All British citizens should have the right to vote. This is democracy.
attributes.background: I am a British citizen living abroad. I was not given the right to vote in the 2016 referendum which is very undemocratic. Brexit is a matter that concerns all British citizens whether they are residents or not. It is a question of their future and the future of their children.
